subject: 20% more conversions for SIMSONN
description_text:
Hi,

Since you're in the ecom space, thought it made sense to reach out.

I help ecommerce brands turn more of their traffic into paying customers without increasing ad spend.

Cambridge University brought me in to test TikTok as a new growth channel. I built the strategy from scratch, generating over 11 million video views and 33,000 landing page visits at just £0.60 per result.

That gave us the qualified traffic we needed, then I used creative testing and retargeting to turn views into real action.

I’m confident I can help SIMSONN too. If you don’t see at least 20 percent more conversions in the first month, you don’t pay a thing.

Something that would be of interest?

Best
Nicholas Walker, Nexus Social

conversations.body_text: 你好，Nicholas Walker，  您能分享一些成功案例的视频供我参考吗？另外，您能展示一下这些案例是如何与您的品牌或平台联系起来的吗？
